description: This file defines a Flutter widget for a product listing screen in an e-book app. It includes UI components like a header with search and filters, a grid of book cards with staggered animations, and filter application logic. It interacts with mock data and navigates to product detail screens.

classes.name: ListingScreen
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the main product listing interface, featuring filtering, searching, and animated grid display of books.

classes.name: _ListingScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the internal state of ListingScreen, including filters, search query, scroll offset, and building UI with parallax header and grid.

classes.name: _StaggeredItem
classes.description: Widget for animated entrance of grid items with staggered delay and scale/opacity transforms.

methods.name: _baseBooks
methods.description: Returns list of books from mock data filtered by selected category and price range.

methods.name: _currentBooks
methods.description: Filters base books further by search query on title or author.

methods.name: openProduct
methods.description: Navigates to product detail page for a given book.

methods.name: _showFilterSheet
methods.description: Displays a modal for selecting filter options like price range and category.

methods.name: _gridCrossAxisCount
methods.description: Determines grid columns based on screen width.

methods.name: _headerParallax
methods.description: Creates a parallax header with search and filter controls, reacting to scroll offset.
